law.history: Repealed 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 168, sec. 157, effective June 1, 2005; and amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 352, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 240, sec. 1.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Refund of tax on cigarettes donated to institutions.
metadata.lrc-note: (6/01/2005). Under KRS 446.260, the repeal of this section in 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 168 prevails over its amendment in 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85.
